meanings: (말·충고 등을) listen (to), follow, obey, take (one's advice), (Am) mind, (formal) heed
(효과가 있다) have an effect (on), be effective, work (for), act (on)

vlive.korean: 누가 그렇게... 네가 다 들은 거 아니야? Who... Did you keep listening to your own song? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
vlive.english: Who... Did you keep listening to your own song?

vlive.korean: [휴닝이는][몰라휴] - 전 들은 적이 없는데 - 저도 들은 적이 없어요 - 제가... [HUENINGKAI has no idea] - I have no memory of that. - Me, neither. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [HUENINGKAI has no idea] - I have no memory of that. - Me, neither.

vlive.korean: 이 여자의 머릿속에는 뭐가 들은 건가? What is inside her head?? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 투 머치 토커 아이유
나 잘못 들은 거 아니지? Did I hear it right? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🐷꿀🐷꿀🐷즈🐷
내가 들은 게 없다고! I didn't hear any of it! 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 남사친이 질투하는 순간_EP03 [라이크]
vlive.english: I didn't hear any of it!

examples.korean: The news plunged them into deep depression. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소식을 들은 그들은 깊은 침울감에 빠졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
